      Use Db4oEmbedded.newConfiguration() instead.
      Methods in com.db4o with parameters of type Configuration 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static ObjectContainer Db4o.openClient​(Configuration config, java.lang.String hostName, int port, java.lang.String user, java.lang.String password)
      Deprecated.
      See the Db4oClientServer class in db4o client server library for methods to open db4o servers and db4o clients.

      Deprecated.
      Use Db4oEmbedded.openFile(EmbeddedConfiguration, String) instead
      static ObjectServer Db4o.openServer​(Configuration config, java.lang.String databaseFileName, int port)
      Deprecated.
      See the Db4oClientServer class in db4o client server library for methods to open db4o servers and db4o clients.
